data.comment: Kortrijk kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Daan Heymans.
In the minute 45, Aleksandar Vukotic is booked for the away team.
Christophe Lepoint (Kortrijk) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Kortrijk - Waasland-Beveren with the kick-off.
Waasland-Beveren's Alessandro Albanese has been booked in Kortrijk.
In the minute 52, An attacking Kortrijk player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Maximiliano Caufriez (Waasland-Beveren) has received a yellow card from Kevin Van Damme.
Ilombe Mboyo scores from the spot and Kortrijk draw level at Guldensporenstadion.
Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a first substitution, with Aboubakary Koita replacing Alessandro Albanese.
In the minute 68, Aboubakary Koita is on target to give Waasland-Beveren a 1-2 advantage.
Faiz Selemani is replacing Loic Ritiere for Kortrijk at Guldensporenstadion.
The home team replace Hannes Van Der Bruggen with Habib Gueye.
In the minute 81, At Guldensporenstadion, Daan Heymans has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The match has come to a close in Kortrijk. The final score is 1-3.
Great finish from Daan Heymans to give Waasland-Beveren a 1-3 lead.
Faiz Selemani (Kortrijk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
